dict.acceptation: 年轻；青年，小伙子；初期，少年（青年）时期；〈集合词〉青少年们；

sent.orig: You have the most marvellous youth, and youth is the one thing worth having.
sent.trans: 你拥有最神奇的青春，而青春是唯一值得拥有的东西。

sent.orig: The Youth League also gets strengthening from this to the cohesive affinity of member youth.
sent.trans: 共青团对团员青年的凝聚力也由此得到加强。

sent.orig: Youth! There's nothing in the world as important as youth!
sent.trans: 年轻！世界上没有比年轻更为重要的事情了！

sent.orig: Actually couldn't distinguish clearly is the youth has wasted time the age, age dispirited youth.
sent.trans: 分不清究竟是青春蹉跎了年龄，还是年龄颓废了青春。

sent.orig: Community values youth –Young person perceives that adults in the community value youth.
sent.trans: 社区重视青少年——青少年能感到社区人士对他们的重视。
